title: About the format of this booksite
summary: I'm a technical writer by profession. Late into the drafting process for my first manuscript, I realized that the web offered several possibilities that a physical book did not. The following are notes about the technologies & design principles that underpin this booksite.

title: Poems by category
summary: Every poem is tagged with one or more keywords that allow me to group similar poems. (There's no love keyword because they're all love poems.) This page compiles each series & keyword into a list of poems.
